mapper.insert: insert into cidev_user (id, name, email, phone, created_at, updated_at) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.select: select id, name, email, phone, created_at, updated_at from cidev_user where id = #{id}
select id, name, email, phone, created_at, updated_at from cidev_user where name = #{name}
